questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Urban cityscape
D) Wildlife and animals

B) At a beach
C) In a city
D) In a forest

A) A bustling market
B) A serene sunset
C) A sports event
D) A family gathering

B) Multiple skyscrapers
C) A park
D) A river

A) A large tree

A) A garden
